title: KarthikeyanOnline
author: KarthikeyanOnline
content: New Airdrop: JoyThe rewards: $10,000 worth of Joy tokens ($7500 for participation and $2500 for referral rewards).For completing all tasks: $5 worth of Joy tokensReferral:$2 worth of Joy tokens referral [Max. Reward Cap per referrer is $100]Rate:      Focus: Random participants who complete all tasks without exception will receive Joy CoinsAirdrop Link: Airdrop BotJoin our Telegram groupFollow us on our Twitter, like and retweet the pinned tweet and tag 3 friendsOpen  wintop.io, connect your wallet address using Metamask/Wallet Connect, and send your connected wallet address here.Note: Airdrop ends on 3rd November. Distribution of the reward will be on December or January.Additional Information:JOY enables web3 game providers/developers to offer a wider range of games, higher limits, and faster payouts. Website | Telegram | Twitter |  Medium | RedditDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any airdrop project, also airdrop is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving airdrop tokens. Just join airdrop for free.
